item.text: At that time, Naomi, her mother-in-law, said to her, “My daughter, I must find a home for you so you will be secure.

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="01162" class="">Boaz</st>, <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="05291" class="">female servants</st> you <st data-num="01961" class="">worked</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">is</st> our <st data-num="04130" class="">close relative</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, <st data-num="03915" class="">tonight</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is <st data-num="02219" class="">winnowing</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="08184" class="">barley</st> at the <st data-num="01637" class="">threshing floor</st>.<n id="3" />

So <st data-num="07364" class="">bathe</st> yourself,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05480" class="">rub on some perfumed oil</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="07760" class="">get</st> <st data-num="08071 05921">dressed up</st>.<n id="3" /> Then <st data-num="03381" class="">go down</st><n id="4" /> to the <st data-num="01637" class="">threshing floor</st>. But <st data-num="0408" class="">don’t</st> let the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> you’re there <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> he <st data-num="03615" class="">finishes</st> his <st data-num="0398 08354">meal</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="01961" class="">When</st> he <st data-num="07901" class="">gets ready to go to sleep</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03045" class="">take careful notice</st> of the <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> he <st data-num="07901" class="">lies down</st>. Then <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st>, <st data-num="01540" class="">uncover</st> his <st data-num="04772" class="">legs</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="07901" class="">lie down</st><n id="3" /> beside him.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> will <st data-num="05046" class="">tell</st><n id="5" /> you <st data-num="0834" class="">what</st> you should <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st>.”
Ruth replied to Naomi, “I will do everything you have told me to do.”
So she went down to the threshing floor and did everything her mother-in-law had instructed her to do.

When <st data-num="01162" class="">Boaz</st> had <st data-num="0398 08354">finished</st> his <st data-num="0398 08354">meal</st> and <st data-num="03190 03820">was feeling satisfied</st>, he <st data-num="0935 07901">lay down to sleep</st> at the <st data-num="07097" class="">far end</st> of the <st data-num="06194" class="">grain heap</st>.<n id="1" /> Then Ruth<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0935" class="">crept up</st> <st data-num="03909" class="">quietly</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="01540" class="">uncovered</st> his <st data-num="04772" class="">legs</st>,<n id="4" /> and <st data-num="07901" class="">lay down</st> beside him.<n id="5" />

In the <st data-num="01961 02677">middle</st> of the <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">he</st> <st data-num="02729" class="">was startled</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03943" class="">turned over</st>.<n id="2" /> Now<n id="3" /> he <st data-num="02009" class="">saw</st> a <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="07901" class="">lying</st> beside <st data-num="04772" class="">him</st>!<n id="5" />

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> are <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>?”<n id="1" /> She <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="07327" class="">Ruth</st>, your <st data-num="0519" class="">servant</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="06566 03671 05921">Marry</st> your <st data-num="0519" class="">servant</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are a <st data-num="01350" class="">guardian of the family interests</st>.”<n id="4" />
He said, “May you be rewarded by the Lord, my dear! This act of devotion is greater than what you did before. For you have not sought to marry one of the young men, whether rich or poor.

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st>, my <st data-num="01323" class="">dear</st>, <st data-num="0408" class="">don’t</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">worry</st>!<n id="1" /> I intend to <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> for you <st data-num="03605 0834">everything</st> you <st data-num="0559" class="">propose</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">everyone</st> in the <st data-num="08179 05971">village</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="03045" class="">knows</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are a <st data-num="02428" class="">worthy</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">yes</st>, it is <st data-num="0551" class="">true</st> that<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am a <st data-num="01350" class="">guardian</st>,<n id="2" /> but <st data-num="03426" class="">there is</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">another</st> <st data-num="01350" class="">guardian</st> who is a <st data-num="07138" class="">closer relative</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> I am.

Remain here tonight. Then in the morning, if he agrees to marry you, fine, let him do so. But if he does not want to do so, I promise, as surely as the Lord lives, to marry you. Sleep here until morning.”

So she <st data-num="07901" class="">slept</st> <st data-num="04772" class="">beside</st> him<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st>. She <st data-num="06965" class="">woke up</st> while it was <st data-num="02958" class="">still</st> <st data-num="05234 0376 07453">dark</st>.<n id="2" /> Boaz <st data-num="0559" class="">thought</st>,<n id="3" /> “<st data-num="0408" class="">No</st> one must <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> a <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">visited</st> the <st data-num="01637" class="">threshing floor</st>.”<n id="4" />

Then he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="03051" class="">Hold out</st> the <st data-num="04304" class="">shawl</st><n id="1" /> you are <st data-num="0834 05921">wearing</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="0270" class="">grip</st> it <st data-num="0270" class="">tightly</st>.” As she <st data-num="0270" class="">held</st> it <st data-num="0270" class="">tightly</st>, he <st data-num="04058" class="">measured out</st> about <st data-num="08337" class="">60 pounds</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="08184" class="">barley</st> into the shawl<n id="4" /> and <st data-num="07896" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> her shoulders. Then he<n id="5" /> <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> into <st data-num="05892" class="">town</st>,

and she returned to her mother-in-law.

When Ruth returned to her mother-in-law, Naomi asked, “How did things turn out for you, my daughter?” Ruth told her about all the man had done for her.

She <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “He <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> me <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="08337" class="">60 pounds</st> of <st data-num="08184" class="">barley</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me,<n id="1" /> ‘Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> your <st data-num="02545" class="">mother-in-law</st> <st data-num="07387" class="">empty-handed</st>.’”<n id="2" />
Then Naomi said, “Stay put, my daughter, until you know how the matter turns out. For the man will not rest until he has taken care of the matter today.”
